thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Elizabeth Lawrie
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Elizabeth Lawrie

author: Elizabeth Lawrie
title: Elizabeth Lawrie
text: Working with Goway to arrange our Australian trip was definitely worthwhile. Their knowledge and experience made it easier for us to decide our itinerary. Barbara was very patient while we worked through to final itinerary and explained each decision made. She ensured we were comfortable with all our plans and the entire trip worked out perfectly. Thank you Goway and Barbara
